name: Oh no ...
description:
After a ritual gone wrong your pet turtle gets infused with a doll and now its your job do end its misery...please do it in time, or it will end you!

The team:

  • Mari-Anna Lepasson (storytelling, audio engineering)
  • Yogini Mauree (3D art)
  • Kevin Polakes (3D art)
  • Siim Soonsein (game development)
